chat.title: AI Chat Bot

error.title: Message could not be sent
error.sendMessage: Please sign in again and try again.
error.newChat: Could not start a new chat. Please try again.
error.exampleQuestion: Could not send the example question. Please try again

exampleQuestions.title: Try asking:
exampleQuestions.additionalHelp: You can ask me about social security.
exampleQuestions.description: Click on one of the following questions to start, or enter your own question.
exampleQuestions.question1: What can be reimbursed as rent and ancillary costs for homeowners?
exampleQuestions.question2: What do I need to consider following an inheritance?
exampleQuestions.question3: Does the salary from the month before support count as income?

chat.selectDocumentsDescription: Choose up to {max} documents to chat with
chat.documentsPreSelectedDescription: {count} document pre-selected for chat | {count} documents pre-selected for chat

status.gradingAnswer: Is the answer grounded in the documents?

errors.title: Error
errors.badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.forbidden: Access denied. You don't have permission for this action.
errors.notFound: The requested item could not be found.
errors.conflict: This action conflicts with the current state.
errors.validationError: Validation failed. Please check your input.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
errors.serverError: Oops, something went wrong on our end.
errors.gatewayTimeout: Request timed out. Please try again.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Manage and view your accessible documents
documents.noDocumentsDescription: You don't have access to any documents yet. Upload your first document to get started.
documents.noResultsDescription: No documents found matching "{query}". Try adjusting your search terms.
documents.noDocumentsInTreeDescription: Your document tree is empty. Upload documents to see them organized by folder structure.
documents.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{fileName}"? This action cannot be undone.
documents.deleteModalMessage_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {count} documents? This action cannot be undone.
documents.deleteMultipleSuccessDescription: {count} document successfully deleted. | {count} documents successfully deleted.
documents.deleteMultiplePartialSuccessDescription: {successCount} document deleted successfully, {failedCount} failed. | {successCount} documents deleted successfully, {failedCount} failed.
documents.updateSuccessDescription: "{fileName}" has been updated. Changes will be reflected in the application within 15 minutes.
documents.refreshErrorDescription: Document was uploaded but failed to refresh the list. Please refresh manually.
documents.deleteErrorDescription: Failed to delete "{fileName}". Please try again.
documents.deleteMultipleErrorDescription: Failed to delete {count} document. Please try again. | Failed to delete {count} documents. Please try again.
documents.unableToLoad: Unable to load "{fileName}". Please try again.
documents.failedToDownload: Failed to download "{fileName}". Please try again.
documents.validationErrorDescription: Please select a file and access role before uploading.
documents.authErrorDescription: Please refresh the page and try again.
documents.uploadErrorDescription: Failed to upload document. Please try again.
documents.uploadErrorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during upload.
documents.updateFailedDescription: Failed to update document. Please try again.
documents.fileSizeErrorDescription: The selected file ({fileSize}) exceeds the maximum allowed size of {maxSize}.
documents.zipExtractionErrorDescription: Failed to extract files from ZIP archive. Please ensure the file is a valid ZIP format.
documents.uploadDescription: Add a new document to your collection
documents.updateDescription: Replace the file and update access role for "{fileName}"
documents.chooseMultipleFiles: Choose up to 10 documents to upload
documents.multipleFileHint: You can select multiple files at once (max 10)
documents.noRoles: No roles available for access control
documents.tooManyFilesErrorDescription: You can select up to {maxFiles} files at once.
documents.invalidFileTypeError: File {fileName} has an unsupported file type
documents.chatWithSelected: Chat with {count} document | Chat with {count} documents
documents.noDocumentsSelectedForChat: No documents selected for chat. Please select 1-5 documents.
documents.tooManyDocumentsSelectedForChat: Too many documents selected. Please select up to 5 documents for chat.
documents.chatWithSelectedSuccessDescription: Successfully selected {count} document for chat | Successfully selected {count} documents for chat
documents.chatWithSelectedErrorDescription: An error occurred while setting up documents for chat. Please try again.
